meanings.definition: The state or quality of being invulnerable.
meanings.sent1: Her invulnerabilities made her feel safe and protected.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's invulnerabilities made him unbeatable in battle.
meanings.sent3: The knight's invulnerabilities were so strong, even the dragon's fire couldn't harm him.
meanings.sent4: His invulnerabilities were like an impenetrable shield against any danger.
meanings.sent5: The fortress was built with invulnerabilities that withstood all attacks.

meanings.definition: The inability to be harmed or damaged.
meanings.sent1: The armor's invulnerabilities protected the warrior from any injury.
meanings.sent2: The diamond's invulnerabilities made it the most durable gemstone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's invulnerabilities to water made bath time a real challenge.
meanings.sent4: His invulnerabilities in the face of criticism were truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The vaccine provided invulnerabilities against the virus.
